title: Installation issue: IOR fails to find pnetcdf libraries
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install ior+ncmpi
...
    293    /home/robl/work/soft/mpich/bin/mpicc  -g -O2   -o ior ior.o utilities.o parse_options.o aiori-POSIX.o aiori-MPIIO.o  aiori-NCMPI.o  -lpnetcdf -lm
  >> 294    /usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lpnetcdf
  >> 295    collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
     296    Makefile:404: recipe for target 'ior' failed
  >> 297    make[2]: *** [ior] Error 1
     298    make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/robl/spack-stage/spack-stage-9s5EYg/ior-3.0.1/src'
     299    Makefile:308: recipe for target 'all' failed
  >> 300    make[1]: *** [all] Error 2
     301    make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/robl/spack-stage/spack-stage-9s5EYg/ior-3.0.1/src'
     302    Makefile:361: recipe for target 'all-recursive' failed
  >> 303    make: *** [all-recursive] Error 1

```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a
Linux hodor 4.15.0-45-generic #48-Ubuntu SMP Tue Jan 29 16:28:13 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    Ubuntu 18.04.2 LTS
``` 
### Additional information

In my packages.yaml file I have made my own build of MPICH a system package:

```  mpich:
        paths:
            mpich@master: /home/robl/work/soft/mpich
```

More information about spack: 
```console
$ spack spec --install-status ior+ncmpi
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   ior+ncmpi

Concretized
--------------------------------
 -   ior@3.0.1%gcc@7.3.0~hdf5+ncmpi arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64 
[+]      ^autoconf@2.69%gcc@7.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64 
[+]      ^automake@1.15.1%gcc@7.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64 
[+]      ^libtool@2.4.6%gcc@7.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64 
[+]          ^m4@1.4.18%gcc@7.3.0 patches=3877ab548f88597ab2327a2230ee048d2d07ace1062efe81fc92e91b7f39cd00,c0a408fbffb7255fcc75e26bd8edab116fc81d216bfd18b473668b7739a4158e,fc9b61654a3ba1a8d6cd78ce087e7c96366c290bc8d2c299f09828d793b853c8 +sigsegv arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64 
[+]              ^libsigsegv@2.11%gcc@7.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64 
[+]      ^mpich@master%gcc@7.3.0 device=ch3 +hydra netmod=tcp +pmi+romio~verbs arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64 
[+]      ^parallel-netcdf@1.11.0%gcc@7.3.0+cxx+fortran+pic arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64 
...


As suggested, I rebuilt the package with the following options:
```console
$ spack -d install -j 1 ior+ncmpi
...

and am attaching the generated files.  The generated files show no -L flags for parallel-netcdf.

[spack-cc-ior-7kzsppv.out.log](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/2870769/spack-cc-ior-7kzsppv.out.log)
[spack-cc-ior-7kzsppv.in.log](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/2870770/spack-cc-ior-7kzsppv.in.log)
